I don't want to destroy it I simply want you to admit
Optimus Primal WAS reformatted.

--- Vincent Price <thecode@...> wrote:
> OOC: I could if I wanted to, because I have my own
> specific names for them, and this is a Beast Wars
> RPG, and not a Beast Machines one, but I won't.
> Because I don't wish to destroy the RPG, like you
> do...
>
